00022 int multipoles::read_crg_eps(const char * namefile ){
00023         ifstream in(namefile);
00024         int i=0;
00025         string word;
00026         double mpl;
00027 
00028         int count = 0;
00029         while( in  ) {
00030                 count ++;
00031                 in >> word;
00032                 if (count %3 == 0){
00033                     sscanf(word.c_str(), "%lf", &mpl);
00034                     mpls.push_back(mpl);
00035                 }
00036         }
00037         in.close();
00038         return 0;
00039 }
